mid.name: Send Signal
entries: The eyelet sends an emergency signal through its scrying sensor to a linked scrying station (see Witness) up to 10 miles away. This transmits the eyelet's distance and direction from the station at the time of sending.

mid.name: Witness
entries: The eyelet records whatever it perceives, storing it in an embedded, marble-sized sensor. The eyelet can record up to 1 hour of events, starting and stopping across a longer period. Removing the sensor erases its records.

An eyelet can transfer everything it has recorded up to 10 miles to its linked scrying station, where the recordings are collected and can be viewed. Doing so empties the sensor so it can be used again. An eyelet can link, or sever its link, to a scrying station as a 10-minute activity with the {@trait concentrate} trait.

mid.name: Send Signal
entries: As {@creature eyelet|Wow2}.

mid.name: Witness
entries: As {@creature eyelet|Wow2}.

bot.name: Swarming Cyclone
entries: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage (DC 25 basic Reflex save). A creature that fails this save is {@condition stunned||stunned 1}.

bot.name: Unnerving Observation
entries: The eyelets focus their sensors on the same target. One enemy in the swarm's space takes {@damage 6d6} mental damage (DC 25 basic Will save). On a failed save, the target is {@condition frightened||frightened 2} (or {@condition frightened||frightened 3} and {@condition fleeing} for 1 round on a critical failure).

mid.name: Fascinating Mimicry
entries: 30 feet. While a glitterspore mimics a plant, its glittering spores and vibrant colors make it unnaturally beautiful. A creature that starts its turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 23 Will save or become {@condition fascinated} by the glitterspore for 1 round. This aura activates automatically when a glitterspore uses Plant Mimicry, and it deactivates when the glitterspore reverts to its natural form.

bot.name: Burrowing Spores
entries: Each enemy in the glitterspore's space takes {@damage 4d8} piercing damage (DC 26 basic Reflex save) and is exposed to spore rot.

bot.name: Invade
entries: The glitterspore enters the ears, mouth, and nostrils of a living non-{@trait fungus} or non-{@trait plant} creature, then bursts out through their flesh. One enemy in the glitterspore's space takes {@damage 7d8} piercing damage (DC 26 basic Reflex save). On a failed save, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} {@condition persistent damage||persistent bleed damage} and is {@condition drained||drained 1}.

bot.name: Plant Mimicry
entries: The glitterspore reconfigures its component spores to assume the shape and appearance of another plant, such as a flower bed, shrubbery, tree, or topiary. This doesn't change the glitterspore's texture or overall size but does alter its coloration and appearance. The glitterspore has an automatic result of 29 (33 in gardens, forests, or swamps) on {@skill Deception} checks and DCs to pass as a non-creature plant. The glitterspore stays in this shape until it takes an action.

bot.name: Spore Cloud
entries: A glitterspore unleashes a cloud of sparkling, hypnotic spores in a 60-foot-radius burst. Each creature in the area is exposed to spore rot and must succeed at a DC 26 Will save or be {@condition fascinated} for {@dice 1d4} rounds.

stages.entry: {@damage 1d6} poison damage plus {@condition clumsy||clumsy 1} and –5-foot status penalty to Speed
{@damage 2d6} poison damage plus {@condition clumsy||clumsy 2} and –10-foot status penalty to Speed
{@damage 3d8} poison damage plus {@condition clumsy||clumsy 3} and {@condition paralyzed}

mid.name: Emotional Vulnerability
entries: A putrifer is easily overwhelmed by confusing thoughts, complex emotions, and resurfacing memories. A putrifer takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saving throws against {@trait emotion} effects and treats the result of its saves against {@trait emotion} effects as one degree worse.

mid.name: Stench
entries: 15 feet. A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save or become {@condition sickened||sickened 2} (plus {@condition off-guard|PC1} as long as it's {@condition sickened} on a critical failure). A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

mid.name: Vengeful Exhalation
mid.trigger: An adjacent creature damages the putrifer
entries: The putrifer exhales, exposing the triggering creature to noxious putrescence.

bot.name: Woodland Stride
entries: The putrifer ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain from non-magical foliage.

top.name: Luminant Aura
entries: 20 feet.

mid.name: Explosive End
entries: {@damage 7d6} bludgeoning, DC 25

mid.name: Reactive Flare
entries: {@damage 4d6} piercing (DC 25 basic Reflex save)

mid.name: Eviscerating Thorns
mid.trigger: A creature that grabs a thrailorn or hits it with an unarmed {@action Strike} or non-reach melee {@action Strike}
entries: The thrailorn's barbed thorns slice open their attacker's body, dealing {@damage 2d6} piercing damage to the triggering creature. If the thrailorn is grabbing or {@condition grabbed} by the triggering creature, it deals 1 {@condition persistent damage||persistent bleed damage}.

bot.name: Embed Thorn
entries: If a thrailorn successfully deals {@condition persistent damage||persistent bleed damage} with its thorn {@action Strike} or Eviscerating Thorns reaction and that creature was already taking {@condition persistent damage||persistent bleed damage}, increase the {@condition persistent damage} by 1. Each time a creature succeeds the flat check to end this {@condition persistent damage||persistent bleed damage}, reduce the bleed damage by 1 instead of ending the condition. A critical success on the flat check ends the condition.

bot.name: Pain-Fueled Flurry
entries: The thrailorn attacks a single foe in a wild, pain-fueled flurry. The thrailorn makes one jaws {@action Strike} and two thorn Strikes in any order. These attacks must target the same creature. These attacks count toward the thrailorn's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the thrailorn makes all their attacks.

mid.name: Battering Frill
mid.trigger: A creature in the durnolith's reach misses the durnolith with a {@action Strike}
entries: The durnolith {@action Strike||Strikes} the attacker with its armored frill. If the strike hits, the durnolith automatically pushes the target 10 feet.

bot.name: Battering Charge
entries: The durnolith {@action Stride||Strides} twice in a straight line and then makes an armored frill {@action Strike}. As long as it moved at least 10 feet, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack roll and the strike gains {@ability Improved Push} 10 feet.

bot.name: Pain-Fueled Roar
entries: The durnolith unleashes a roar of pain and fury. The durnolith attempts a single {@skill Intimidation} check to {@action Demoralize} all living creatures within 60 feet that can hear the durnolith. Roll once and apply the results to all creatures. Each creature is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

abilities: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

top.name: Shadowsense
entries: The shadows of Gloaming Arbor are an extension of Avathrael, and they can sense creatures in areas of dim light or darkness.

mid.name: Floral Defense
mid.trigger: Avathrael is the target of a physical attack
entries: Avathrael raises their plant-covered wings to block the incoming blow. They gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, it's deflected by Avathrael's wing, causing some of the dangerous plants growing on the wing to burst and release a cloud of toxic pollen. The triggering creature takes {@damage 2d10} poison damage (DC 29 basic Fortitude save). On a critical failure, the triggering creature is also {@condition sickened||sickened 1}.

mid.name: Frightful Presence
entries: 90 feet, DC 29

bot.name: Poison Breath
entries: Avathrael exhales a cloud of sweet-smelling poisonous gas that deals {@damage 13d6} poison damage in a 50-foot cone (DC 32 basic Fortitude save). A creature that critically fails is also {@condition sickened||sickened 2}. Avathrael can't use Poison Breath again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.

bot.name: Draconic Momentum
entries: Avathrael recharges their Poison Breath whenever they score a critical hit with a {@action Strike}.

bot.name: Shadow Step
entries: Avathrael teleports with the effects of a 4th-rank {@spell translocate|PC1} spell, but Avathrael must begin and end the {@trait teleportation} effect in an area of dim light or darkness. If they use 2 actions to activate this ability, Avathrael also regains {@dice 8d10} Hit Points. Avathrael can't use Shadow {@action Step} again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.

bot.name: Shape Shadow Realm
entries: Avathrael mentally reshapes their realm, reshaping terrain and creating obstacles to hinder their foes. All squares within a 50-foot burst become difficult terrain. Creatures in the area take {@damage 10d6} void damage (DC 32 basic Reflex save) from the shadows. On a failure, that creature is additionally {@condition grabbed} by the malleable shadows ({@action Escape} DC 32). At the beginning of Avathrael's turn, each creature that's {@condition grabbed} takes {@damage 4d6} void damage. Avathrael can't use Shape Shadow Realm again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.

bot.name: Snuff Light
entries: Avathrael exhales, automatically extinguishing all non-magical lights within 100 feet. Avathrael attempts to counteract each light source within 100 feet ({@hit +22} counteract).

bot.name: Woodland Stride
entries: Avathrael ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain from non-magical foliage.

creature.name: Khasprickle
items: {@runeItem hide||+1 armor potency||resilient||+1 resilient hide armor}

attacks.name: quill
attacks.damage: {@damage 2d4+10} piercing plus pukwudgie poison and quill fighter

attacks.name: quill
attacks.damage: {@damage 2d4+10} piercing plus pukwudgie poison and quill fighter

mid.name: Defensive Quills
entries: A creature that hits a pukwudgie with an unarmed {@action Strike} or a non-{@trait reach} melee {@action Strike} takes {@damage 3d8} piercing damage (DC 28 basic Reflex save). On a critical failure, the creature also takes {@damage 1d6} {@condition persistent damage||persistent poison damage} from the poisoned quills.

bot.name: Brush By
bot.trigger: Khasprickle leaves a square adjacent to an enemy
entries: Khasprickle roughly brushes up against the enemy with his quills as he passes by. Khasprickle makes a melee quill {@action Strike}. On a success, he additionally {@action Shove||Shoves} the target.

bot.name: Change Shape
entries: Khasprickle takes on the physical form of a giant porcupine. His size changes to Medium, he loses his weapon {@action Strike||Strikes}, and he gains a quill {@action Strike} ({@hit +21} for {@damage 2d8+8} piercing plus {@damage 1d8} {@condition persistent damage||persistent poison}).

bot.name: Pincushion
entries: Khasprickle makes three quill {@action Strike||Strikes} in quick succession. These {@action Strike||Strikes} count toward his multiple attack penalty but don't apply the multiple attack penalty until all three {@action Strike||Strikes} are complete.

bot.name: Quill Fighter
entries: Khasprickle wields his quills like a deadly weapon. He deals an additional {@damage 3d6} precision damage with quill {@action Strike||Strikes} against {@condition off-guard|PC1} targets. On a critical hit with a quill, Khasprickle pierces a pressure point or nerve cluster with pinpoint accuracy; the target becomes {@condition clumsy||clumsy 2} for {@dice 1d4} rounds (or increases the value of their {@condition clumsy} condition by 1).

creature.name: Unaasi
items: {@item 4th-level spell wand of thundering echoes|LOtGB|wand of thundering echoes (4th)}

top.name: Explosive End
entries: When Unaasi dies, the planar portal inside them collapses, causing them to explode in a burst of scouring energy that deals {@damage 11d6} fire damage to all creatures in their luminant aura (DC 32 basic Reflex save). Their body is completely consumed, leaving behind only their gear.

top.name: Ghoran Memories
entries: Unaasi can {@action Recall Knowledge} on any subject with a {@hit +21} modifier.

mid.name: Luminant Aura
entries: 20 feet. The volatile planar energy coursing through a woodblessed's veins fills the area with dim light.

mid.name: Delicious
entries: Ghorans were originally created to be scrumptious food. A ghoran takes an additional 5 damage from jaws {@action Strike||Strikes}, fangs {@action Strike||Strikes}, or other similar {@action Strike||Strikes} with a creature's mouth. When a ghoran is {@condition grabbed} or {@condition restrained} by a creature's jaws, fangs, or mouth, the DC to {@action Escape} is increased by 2.

mid.name: Reactive Flare
mid.trigger: Unaasi is damaged by a creature within their reach
entries: Unaasi temporarily loses control of the planar energy within them. Both they and the triggering creature take {@damage 6d6} fire damage (DC 30 basic Reflex save).

bot.name: Scouring Surge
entries: Unaasi unleashes the planar energy coursing through their body for a split-second, dealing {@damage 11d6} fire damage (DC 30 basic Reflex save) to all creatures in their luminant aura. They can't use Scouring Surge again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.

bot.name: Signature Spells
entries: Unaasi can heighten the following spells freely: {@spell charm|PC1}, {@spell force barrage|PC1}, {@spell resist energy|PC1}, {@spell rip the spirit|SoM}, {@spell soothe|PC1}.

bot.name: Steady
entries: Spellcasting Unaasi is a confident spellcaster and doesn't easily lose their focus. If a reaction would disrupt their spellcasting action, Unaasi attempts a DC {@flatDC 15} flat check. If they succeed, their action isn't disrupted.

bot.name: Tap Planar Energy
entries: Unaasi taps into the planar energy surging through them, using this energy to empower themself or their next attack.

items: If their next action is to {@action Stride}, Unaasi is launched off the ground and propelled forward. During this {@action Stride}, they have a fly Speed equal to their Speed. If they don't end their movement on a solid surface that can support their weight, they fall.
If their next action is to make a melee or ranged {@action Strike}, that {@action Strike} deals an additional {@damage 3d6} fire damage.
If their next action is to {@action Cast a Spell}, the range of that spell increases by 30 feet, and the area of that spell increases by 10 feet.

bot.name: Sneak Attack
entries: The shadow sage deals an additional {@damage 2d6} precision damage to {@conditio noff-guard|PC1} creatures.

abilities: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

bot.name: Sneak Attack
entries: The pixie deals an additional {@damage 1d6} precision damage to {@condition off-guard|PC1} creatures.

bot.name: Sprinkle Pixie Dust
entries: The pixie sprinkles pixie dust onto one of their arrows. If the pixie hits a creature with that arrow before the pixie's next turn, the arrow inflicts one of the following special effects instead of dealing damage. Each effect depends on the target's DC 24 Will save. On a critical hit, the target gets a result one degree worse than it rolled.

items: {@b Confusion} ({@trait emotion}, {@trait mental}) The target suffers the effects of a 4th-rank {@spell confusion|PC1} spell.

{@b Shadow Shroud} ({@trait darkness}, {@trait incapacitation}) On a failed Will save, the target is enveloped in shadows. It perceives its surroundings as though bright light conditions were only dim light and dim light as though it was darkness.
{@b Supernatural Chill} ({@trait cold}, {@trait shadow}) The target takes {@damage 5d6} cold damage (basic Fortitude save).

bot.name: Warden's Protection
entries: The pixie deals an additional {@dice 1d6} damage to any creature trespassing in the Gloaming Arbor.

creature.name: Timber Titan
creature.description: Variant giant animated statues (Pathfinder Monster Core 19)

items.name: Splinter
items.trigger: A creature critically hits a timber titan
entries: The timber titan makes a spar {@action Strike} against a creature within 30 feet. This attack ignores any reactions triggered by making ranged attacks.

bot.name: Sprinkle Pixie Dust
entries: Sylvarindarian sprinkles pixie dust onto one of his arrows. If he hits a creature with that arrow before his next turn, the arrow inflicts one of the following special effects of his choice instead of dealing damage. Each effect depends on the result of the target's attempt at a DC 25 Will save. On a critical hit, the target gets a result one degree worse than it rolled.

items: {@b Charm} ({@trait emotion}, {@trait incapacitation}, {@trait mental}) The arrow has the effect of a {@spell charm|PC1} spell, except the target doesn't gain a bonus to its save if the only {@condition hostile} act was Sylvarindarian firing his bow, and he can choose to direct the target's adoration toward another creature rather than himself.
{@b Memory Loss} ({@trait mental}) On a failed Will save, the target loses the last 5 minutes of its memory.
{@b Subdual} ({@trait mental}, {@trait nonlethal}) The target takes {@damage 6d6} mental damage, depending on the result of its basic Will save.

bot.name: Hooking Hurl
bot.requirements: The ogre's last action was a successful ogre hook {@action Strike}
entries: The ogre latches the hook into the target and attempts to {@action Reposition|PC1} the target with a sudden flick, even if the ogre doesn't have a free hand. This attempt doesn't apply the ogre's multiple attack penalty. If the target ends its movement adjacent to an obstacle or adjacent to a creature of equal or greater size, the target also takes {@damage 1d10} bludgeoning damage and is off-guard for 1 round.

bot.name: Stomp the Small
entries: The ogre's melee and ranged Strikes deal an additional 2 damage to Medium creatures. This additional damage increases to {@dice 1d6+2} damage to Small or smaller creatures.

mid.name: Cat's Luck
mid.trigger: Izurran fails or critically fails a Reflex saving throw
entries: Izurran rerolls that saving throw and takes the better result.

mid.name: Spiteful Curse
mid.trigger: A creature within 30 feet that Izurran can see would succeed at a save
entries: Izurran hisses a spiteful curse at the triggering creature. The target must reroll the triggering saving throw and use the worse result.

bot.name: Familiar
entries: Izurran's familiar is Zasir, a cobra with a Speed of 25 feet, a climb Speed of 25 feet, darkvision, and fire resistance 4. Zasir is currently empowered by Izurran's patron; see below.
